jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer - GoLang Developer
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Company DescriptionAbout Sutherland: Artificial Intelligence. Automation. Cloud engineering. Advanced analytics. For business leaders, these are key factors of success. For us, they‚Äôre our core expertise.We work with iconic brands worldwide. We bring them a unique value proposition through market-leading technology and business process excellence.We‚Äôve created over 200 unique inventions under several patents across AI and other critical technologies. Leveraging our advanced products and platforms, we drive digital transformation, optimize critical business operations, reinvent experiences, and pioneer new solutions, all provided through a seamless ‚Äúas a service‚Äù model.For each company, we provide new keys for their businesses, the people they work with, and the customers they serve. We tailor proven and rapid formulas, to fit their unique DNA. We bring together human expertise and artificial intelligence to develop digital chemistry. This unlocks new possibilities, transformative outcomes and enduring relationships.SutherlandUnlocking digital performance. Delivering measurable resultsJob DescriptionIn the Role you get:       Hands on experience in GoLang, NodeJS 5 to 7 years of technical experience in full stack development Hands-on experience in Angular Hands-on experience with scripting languages in the back end (NodeJS, Python, Golang etc). Hands-on experience delivering microservices based architectures and design Hands-on experience working with Kubernetes based applications and container workloads Cloud Native (specifically good experience designing 12-factor apps). In depth understanding of Contract first/API first design and delivery experience. Strong experience in API design (OAS, middleware, external vs internal facing, etc.) Define Sutherland‚Äôs reputation: Oversee and manage performance and service quality to guarantee customer satisfaction; provide coaching and feedback. Work towards common goal of ‚ÄúOne Sutherland Team playing to win‚Äù.
QualificationsOur most successful candidates will have:       Academic: BE / BTECH (CSE, IT), B.Sc. (Computers), BCA / MCA Or Other Bachelor / Master‚Äôs Degree in Computing / IT preferred Functional Domain: Healthcare IT / IT Services Delivery domain. - Experience: Relevant years of experience in similar role. Communication skills: Have strong verbal and written communication skills, be able to communicate in a clear, constructive, and professional manner. Personality: Good time-management skills. Team player: Be pro-active in developing trust and professional rapport with employees and team members; work as a team-player Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with minimal supervision. Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company‚Äôs success. Critical thinker and problem-solving skills. Be strategic in developing solutions and process improveme

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer (Mid-Level)
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  We‚Äôre Hiring: Full Stack Developer (Mid-Level)Are you a passionate developer who loves building scalable, high-impact web applications?Join 4baseCare Precision Health Pvt. Ltd., where innovation meets purpose! üöÄüíº Position: Full Stack Developer (Java, Node.js, React, MySQL, Angular)üìç Location: Bangaloreüïì Experience: 2+ yearsüîß What You‚Äôll Do      Design, develop, and implement robust and scalable web applications using Java, Node.js, and React.js.
      Develop and integrate RESTful APIs for seamless front-end and back-end communication.
      Manage and optimize MySQL databases ‚Äî schema design, query performance, and scalability.
      Collaborate with UX/UI designers, product managers, and developers to deliver world-class features.
      Write clean, maintainable, and testable code following best practices.
      Participate in code reviews and mentor junior developers.
      Troubleshoot, debug, and enhance production systems.
      Implement secure authentication and authorization (JWT, OAuth).
      Work with Microservices architecture and stay updated with the latest tech trends.
üéØ What We‚Äôre Looking For      Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
      2+ years of experience in Full Stack Development (Java, Node.js, React).
      Strong hands-on with MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript.
      Familiar with Git/GitHub, Agile methodologies, and unit testing (Jest, Chai, Mocha).
      Excellent problem-solving skills, teamwork, and communication.
üåà Bonus Points For      Experience with AWS / GCP.
      Exposure to Docker / Kubernetes.
      Familiarity with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or BitBucket Pipelines.
      Knowledge of Angular.js or Python.
‚ú® If you‚Äôre ready to code, collaborate, and create impact ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to hear from you!üì© Apply Now: careers@4basecare.com

jobs.title: Software Engineer 2
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Job DetailsDescriptionGENERAL SUMMARY: Archer is the industry-leading enterprise software for Integrated Risk Management and recognized as leaders in the Gartner quadrant for several years now. Archer helps organizations manage risk in the digital era‚Äîuniting stakeholders, integrating technologies, and transforming risk into reward. Over a thousand customers worldwide harness the ArcherIRM platform and its comprehensive suite of solutions to automate the compliance process, meet their risk objectives, and optimize business.This position is for a modern and brand new SaaS product ‚ÄúArcher Engage‚Äù having 120+ customers worldwide. Archer Engage suite of products delivers a modern, consumer app-like user experience to the infrequent users and stake holders to ensure active engagement in helping the enterprise manage risk and third-party risk management. Engage is based on serverless architecture and built on cutting edge technology stack comprising of AWS Cloud Native Services, ReactJS,.NETCore, NodeJS, Kubernetes and Gitlab CI/CD. For more information, visit https://www.archerirm.com/We are seeking a passionate, self-motivated Software Quality Engineer with proven hands-on experience in Manual and Automated testing. You will be joining a top notch and highly motivated team of DevOps engineers who thrive on end-to-end ownership of entire product life cycle starting from design to deployment to operations.Principal Duties And Responsibilities      Authors and executes test cases and testing methodology for manual and/or automated tests.Understands and adheres to delivery/quality targets established during regression and testing phase.Contribute to test automation activities through knowledge of coding/programming in current languages.Develops new test methodologies or processes, re-evaluates existing processes. Contributes to the development and achievement of organizational goals and objectives.General understanding of business environment. Fosters teamwork and collaboration within and across work groups.Responsible for providing requirements and specifications for the test cases.Accountable for delivery of subsystem, anticipate issues and addresses proactively.Fully competent in the design, implementation, and maintenance of a test environment, including necessary equipment, configuration, and software.Demonstrated skill with developing appropriate test methodologies. Fully competent in the use of necessary tools and applications.
Required Skills      Good knowledge in SDLCExperience in Software Test Life Cycle (Test Estimation, Test Strategy, Test Plan, Testing, Defect Mgmt, etc) General knowledge of .NET, MS SQL, JavaScript.Experience in UI & API Test Automation Framework (Preferably Playwright)Experience in Test automation scripting (Say, Typescript)Experience in Agile.Working knowledge in Enterprise SaaS productEducation: BE/BTech/MCA or equivalent Computer Science qualif

jobs.title: Java Full stack Developer
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Job Description Technical Skills      Programming Languages: Proficient in Java (8+), JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and PL/SQL. Frameworks & Libraries: Hands-on experience with Spring Boot, React.js, and Node.js. Web Services: Strong knowledge of REST and SOAP API development and integration. Version Control: Experience with Git and collaborative development using GitHub. Backend & Databases: Expertise in Oracle and PostgreSQL (preferred: Postgres shining stars ). CI/CD Tools: Working knowledge of Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and applying TDD/BDD practices. Testing Tools: Experience with ReadyAPI, Postman, Jest, and JUnit for automated and integration testing. Cloud Technologies: Exposure to OCI (Oracle Cloud Infrastructure), Azure, AWS, or equivalent cloud environments. AI Tools: Familiar with GitHub Copilot for enhanced development productivity. Containerization & Microservices: Practical experience with Docker, Kubernetes (K8s), Microservices, and Micro Frontends. 
Nice to Have      Test Automation Frameworks: Experience with Selenium, Cucumber (Java), and Kafka integration. 
4 must havesJava: 4/5React JS, Springboot: 4/5Database (Oracle): 3/5CI/CD and Version: 4/5

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.company: Terra Technology Circle Consulting Private Limited
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Job Title: MERN Stack DeveloperExperience: 2‚Äì3 yearsLocation: Pune, Bangalore and NoidaEmployment Type: PermanentAbout the RoleWe are looking for a talented MERN Stack Developer to join our development team. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience building scalable web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js, and a passion for writing clean, efficient code.Key Responsibilities      Develop, test, and maintain full-stack web applications using the MERN stack.Design and implement RESTful APIs and integrate with front-end components.Collaborate with UI/UX designers and backend teams to deliver seamless user experiences.Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and performance.Participate in code reviews, debugging, and deployment activities.Stay updated with emerging technologies and best practices in web development.

What We Offer      Competitive salary and benefits package.Opportunity to work on innovative projects with modern technologies.Supportive and collaborative team culture.

jobs.title: Technical Architect
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  We are seeking a seasoned Technical Architect with 12+ years of hands-on experience to lead the design and development of scalable enterprise solutions. This is a critical role for candidates with deep technical expertise in backend development, cutting-edge cloud and microservices architectures, SaaS/B2B platforms, and modern DevOps and AI/ML practices. Required Skills & Qualifications*12‚Äì18 years of experience as a solution or technical architect in high-growth product or platform environments*Advanced expertise in backend architecture (Node.js, Python), microservices, APIs, and cloud infrastructure*Hands-on experience with Docker, container orchestration, and CI/CD automation (Jenkins, GitLab CI, etc.)*Experience integrating and optimizing AI/ML solutions in enterprise products*B2B/SaaS platform architecture and scaling knowledge*Strong understanding of DevOps, infrastructure as code (Terraform, Ansible), and security best practices*Excellent analytical, communication, and leadership skills*Bachelor‚Äôs/Master‚Äôs in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
                
                
                Desired Skills and Experience
                
                  backend development , microservices , Docker , Node.js , Python , AI/ML , cloud , APIs , DevOps , SaaS/B2B platforms , analytical skills , communication skills , leadership skills

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Company Description:CirclePe is transforming India‚Äôs rental landscape by removing the burden of security deposits. As an exclusive club for trustworthy tenants, CirclePe enables members to move into their dream homes with zero-security deposits.Backed by OTP Ventures, IIT Delhi, and the founders of BharatPe and Paytm, CirclePe is building a trusted, transparent, and accessible renting ecosystem.Headquartered in Gurugram, we‚Äôre a team driven by innovation, trust, and impact.Role: Full Stack DeveloperLocation: On-site, GurugramType: Full-timeCompensation: ‚Çπ5.5 ‚Äì ‚Çπ9 LPAQualifications:- Proficiency in Full-Stack Development front-end and back-end.- Strong understanding of core web technologies.-Experience with modern front-end frameworks (React, Next.js, or similar).- Experience with Node.js, NestJS, or Express.js for backend development.- Familiarity with databases like MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or MySQL.- Familiarity with cloud services(AWS, GCP).- Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.- Ability to work collaboratively in an agile team environment.- Prior experience in fintech is a plus.got any queries?drop here at akash@circlepe.com
